name: Polaris (itch) (Arkonaire, tsar5050, purplewarrior)
description:
Polaris is a rhythm-based player vs bot game. Defend yourself from enemy bullets and hit back with the power collected from these polarized bullets. Use quantum operations to fight your enemy and vibe with the groovy music 

How to Play : Match the angle of polarization of your shield with the bullet's angle to absorb the energy, otherwise incur damage 

Controls : Press Z to toggle between 45 & 135 degrees and Press X to toggle between 0 & 90 degrees
